name: bus_detours
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool septa.
Tool description: Provides hackathon-style access to the SEPTA API.

Allows introspection of the SEPTA locations and routes, and provides basically-realtime data on delays, alerts, vehicles, and routes.
API description: Fetches the bus detours from the SEPTA API based on the specified route number.

req1.description: The route number for which to retrieve detour information. Defaults to 2.
